sourcesContent: import React from 'react'; import Modal from 'react-bootstrap/Modal'; import {Button,Tabs,Tab} from 'react-bootstrap'; import Title from '../components/Common/Title/Title' export default function DonationModal(props) { return ( </Modal.Title> </Modal.Header> <Modal.Body> <Tabs defaultActiveKey="donateOnce" id="uncontrolled-tab-example"> <Tab eventKey="donateOnce" title="Donate Once"> <div className="col-lg-12 col-md-12 col-sm-12 col-xs-12 pt-5 pb-0 pl-0 pr-0"> <span>Enter the amount you want to contribute:</span> <input type="number" className="contributionAmount"/> <span className="fontStyle">Rs</span> </div> <div className="col-lg-12 col-md-12 col-sm-12 col-xs-12 pt-5 pb-0 pl-0 pr-0"> <span>Would you like to keep your donation anonymous :</span> </div> </Tab> <Tab eventKey="profile" title="Profile"> <p>Tabs</p> </Tab> </Tabs> </Modal.Body> <Modal.Footer> <Button onClick={props.onHide} className="Cancel">Cancel</Button> <Button>Proceed</Button> </Modal.Footer> </Modal> ); }
